pageContent:
What does This Plugin Do ?

An endless runner!  Duck or jump over obstacles to earn points in this mini-game plugin for RPG Maker MV.  Give your players a chance to unwind from saving the world and let them have fun in this easy to use mini-game.

Compatibility

‚ùåVisuStella Free Plugins (untested)

‚úÖ Mouse & Keyboard Support

‚úÖ Gamepad Support

‚ùå Mobile Support (untested)

‚úÖ Windows/Mac/Linux 

‚úÖ Browsers/Mobile Browsers


Parameters

You'll be able to customize everything from the ground the player walks on to the speed at which the player moves and jumps. Change the background music and image and the obstacles the player must jump over and duck under.



Speed - Changes the speed at which the player moves

Jump speed -  Change how fast the player reaches the top of their jump

Jump Time - Change the duration of the players jump

Death Action -  An eval expression which lets you create a list of actions which effect the player. Do things like flash the sprite, move it off screen or a number of other things.

Jump Obstacles - Add a list of obstacles the player must jump over, each entry in the list is the obstacle's image and you can add as many obstacles as you'd like.

Duck Obstacles - Add a list of obstacles the player must duck under, you can add as many as you'd like.

Spritesheet Options - Customize the way your spritesheet functions,  adjust the frame's width and height as well as the speed at which to play each frame.

F.A.Q?

Q: Where can I find the Terms of Use?

A: We have detailed information on our website on the terms of use page.

Q: How do you use the demo files?

A: Create a new project in RPG Maker MZ and then copy the contents of the demo archive into the new project root directory.

Q: If the plugin is updated after I purchase the plugin, will I have access to the updates?

A: Yes! You will have access to all future updates and bug fixes. All you have to do is come back to the plugin's product page and download the latest version.

Q: Do you actively support your plugins

A: We will support our plugins for years to come and we always fix any bugs which are reported to us as soon as possible. 

Q: I found a bug; how do I report it?

A: We recommend you email us about it, but remember the bug must be reproducible in the demo (new project + demo files) before we look into it. For further information on sujpport visit our support page

Q: What is with the beta releases of your plugins?

A: Beta releases are generally releases that include fixes to a previously released plugin. Sometimes we will also actively sell a plugin which is still in the beta phase.

Q: Which plugin should I download, beta or release?

A: We highly recommend the plugin available in labeled under the release channel unless you want to test upcoming features and bug fixes, then feel free to download the beta version.
title: Endless Runner for RPG Maker
shortText: Duck, jump, and embark in a customizable endless runner mini-game!

pageContent:
Plugin requires RPG Maker MV 1.6 or greater to work

What does this plugin do?

This plugin gives the player the ability to skip a video played by RPG Maker. Without this plugin, playing a video in RPG Maker requires the player to watch the entire video, with no option of pausing or skipping it. With this plugin you will have the choice to skip the video or pause it on demand.

Compatibility

‚úÖ Mouse & Keyboard Support

‚úÖ Gamepad Support

‚ùå Mobile Support (untested)

‚úÖ Windows/Mac/Linux 

‚úÖ Browsers/Mobile Browsers

Skip a video

Pause a video

Plugin Parameters

There are plenty of options to customize it the way you'd like to.

  • Choose which key to pause and skip the video with
  • You can now choose stop gameplay while the video is playing!
  • Skip the video with the click of a mouse
  • Customize text to display so the player knows which key to press or when the video is paused

Misc Attribution:
Sample Video included in Demo project and screenshots/gifs
(c) copyright 2008, Blender Foundation / www.bigbuckbunny.org

F.A.Q?

Q: How do you use the demo files?

A: Create a new project in RPG Maker MZ and then copy the contents of the demo archive into the new project root directory, and then copy the latest version of this plugin into the "plugins" directory of your new project.

Q: I found a bug; how do I report it?

A: We recommend you email us about it, but remember the bug must be reproducible in the demo (new project + demo files) before we will look into it.

Q: May I request a new feature?

A: Absolutely! If you have an idea which could improve the plugin, we highly recommend you email  us your idea. Small or large, let us know and we will let you know if it's something we will implement.

Q: If the plugin is updated after I purchase the plugin, will I have access to the updates?

A: Yes! You will have access to all future updates and bug fixes. All you have to do is come back to the plugin's product page and download the latest version.

Q: Do you actively support your plugins

A: We do and will support our plugins for years to come and we always fix any bugs which are reported to us as soon as possible. 

Q: What is with the beta releases of your plugins?

A: Beta releases are generally releases that include fixes to a previously released plugin. Sometimes we will also actively sell a plugin which is still in the beta phase.

Q: Which plugin should I download, beta or release?

A: We highly recommend the plugin available in labeled under the release channel unless you want to test upcoming features and bug fixes, then feel free to download the beta version.
title: Skip Video for RPG Maker MV
shortText: Unlock the power to skip videos in RPG Maker, offering you greater control over the player's viewing experience.

pageContent:
Unleash Your Imagination

Prepare to dive into the limitless realm of game design with our groundbreaking plugin. This isn't just any plugin; it's the key to unlocking your game's true potential. Welcome to a world where customization knows no bounds.

The Power in Your Hands

This plugin empowers you with the unparalleled ability to create and fine-tune your very own custom stats and skills. Each can be leveled up individually, offering endless possibilities. These tailor-made stats aren't just for show ‚Äì they become integral parts of your game, impacting damage calculations, event triggers, equipment effects, and more.

üìà Elevate Progression: Customize your point-earning system with formulas that factor in skill and stat levels, ensuring that your characters grow in a way that suits your vision.

üõ°Ô∏è Equipment Mastery: Apply bonuses or penalties to your stats when equipping specific gear, adding a layer of strategic depth to your gameplay.

üìä Smart Scaling: Fine-tune the cost of leveling up your skills and stats using formulas that respond to your game's dynamics, creating an engaging and balanced progression system.

üîó Seamless Integration: This plugin plays harmoniously with VisuStellaMZ base plugins, ensuring compatibility and ease of use.

The future of your game's customization is in your hands. Forge a unique gaming experience that's unlike any other. With this plugin, there are no boundaries, only endless possibilities. Embrace the power of true customization and set your game apart from the rest. Grab the plugin today and start shaping your masterpiece! üå†

Compatibility

‚úÖVisuStella Free Plugins (Tested with free demo)

‚úÖ Mouse & Keyboard Support

‚úÖ Gamepad Support

‚ùå Mobile Support (untested)

‚úÖ Windows/Mac/Linux 

‚úÖ Browsers/Mobile Browsers

Parameters


Similar Plugins

This plugin is part of an ongoing plugin series of fallout style mechanics for RPG Maker., the other plugins in the series are below.

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)

Q: How do I make the most of the demo files?

A: Getting started with our demo files is a breeze! Simply initiate a fresh project in RPG Maker MZ, and then sprinkle some magic by copying the contents of the demo archive into the root directory of your new project. Don't forget to add the latest version of this plugin into the "plugins" directory of your shiny new project.

Q: Bug hunters unite! How do I report a pesky bug?

A: We appreciate your vigilance! To report a bug, please shoot us an emailor tag us in our Discord server. Just remember, the bug needs to be reproducible in the demo (created by combining a new project with our demo files) before it lands on our investigation radar.

Q: Can I request new features?

A: Absolutely! We're all ears for your brilliant ideas. Whether your concept is a small tweak or a grand transformation, don't hesitate to email us with your proposal. We'll review your suggestion and let you know if it's a star we can add to our constellation.

Q: What happens when the plugin gets a makeover? Do I get updates?

A: You bet! Whenever we release updates and squash those pesky bugs, you'll be the first in line. Just revisit the plugin's product page and grab the latest version. It's all part of the package.

Q: Do you provide active support for your plugins?

A: You're in good hands! We're committed to supporting our plugins for years to come. Any bug reports that come our way are our top priority, and we strive to fix them as swiftly as possible.

Q: Tell me about these beta releases. What's the deal?

A: Betas are our secret sauce! They're updates that fine-tune previously released plugins. Occasionally, we'll also offer a plugin for sale while it's still in beta. It's like a sneak peek behind the curtain.

Q: Release or beta, that is the question. Which one should I choose?

A: We recommend reaching for the stars with the plugin labeled "release" unless you're feeling adventurous and want to explore upcoming features and fixes. In that case, our beta version is your ticket to the future.

Don't hesitate to reach out if you have more questions. We're here to make your RPG Maker journey as epic as your games! üåü
title: Stat & Skill Levels for RPG Maker MZ
shortText: Elevate your RPG with customizable stats and skills. Shape your game like never before.

pageContent:
Unlock Limitless Storage: Your Game, Your Treasure Chests!

What Does This Plugin Do?

This plugin brings a valuable feature to your game: unlimited storage containers. It enables your players to deposit and withdraw items from containers placed throughout your game world, enhancing the exploration experience.

üì¶ Unlimited Storage Magic: With this plugin, the sky's the limit. Create an infinite number of storage containers, giving players the freedom to stow away their treasures as they journey through your captivating world.

üéÅ Preset Container Perfection: Streamline your game's experience by setting up preset containers filled with default items. It's like leaving hidden treasures just waiting to be discovered.

üé≤ Random Containers of Riches: Infuse unpredictability into your game with random containers that brim with predefined items. Each find is a new twist in the tale.

üìú Tailor-Made Terminology: Customize the transfer scene by choosing the terms that resonate best with your game's narrative. It's your story‚Äîtell it your way.

Say goodbye to storage limitations and embrace boundless possibilities. With this plugin, every container becomes a story waiting to be uncovered. Get ready to surprise and delight your players as they embark on an epic journey to fill their treasure troves. Grab the plugin today and redefine your game's storage dynamics! üåü

Compatibility

‚úÖ VisuStella Free Plugins (Tested and working with the Free Demo)

‚úÖ Mouse & Keyboard Support

‚úÖ Gamepad Support

‚ùå Mobile Support (untested)

‚úÖ Windows/Mac/Linux 

‚úÖ Browsers/Mobile Browsers

title: Storage System for RPG Maker MZ
shortText: Expand your world by seamlessly integrating an endless array of unique storage containers into your gameplay experience.

pageContent:
What does This Plugin Do ?

This Waypoints plugin gives you the ability to create waypoints for your game,  giving the player the ability to "fast travel" to locations in your game.

Much in the style of Diablo 2. You will be able to lock and unlock waypoints as well as choose your own animations using a common event when you fast travel. Each waypoint will be able to have a thumbnail picture and a description of the location it will transfer you to.

Compatibility

‚ùåVisuStella Free Plugins (untested)

‚úÖ Mouse & Keyboard Support

‚úÖ Gamepad Support

‚ùå Mobile Support (untested)

‚úÖ Windows/Mac/Linux 

‚úÖ Browsers/Mobile Browsers

Parameters

Waypoint Templates -  A list of all of your waypoint templates. This is how you create your waypoints and control them with plugin commands

Waypoint Categories - All the categories for your waypoints.
You can use chapters acts, or categorize your waypoints by area, its up to you.

Transfer Common Event - The common event to activate upon a waypoint transfer.

Transfer Delay - The time delay to wait before transferring. Make this delay
larger if your common event is big and takes time to complete.

Transfer Fade - The type of screen fade to upon transferring of the player

Hide Categories - Allows you to hide categories which are empty

Window Category Options - Change these settings to adjust the scene to how
you'd like it to appear.


Waypoint Window Options - Change these settings to adjust the waypoints
window to how you'd like it to appear.

Scene Background - The background image for the waypoints scene.

Lockstate Icons - The icons for the current lockstate of the waypoints.
